metadata.name: Amethyst Crystal Druse
metadata.description: A few months before creating these enchanting crystal druses, I came across an article about the Cave of Crystal in Mexico. It is filled with incredible meters-long (meters-long!) thick, white crystals. I had always found crystals to be spectacular, and perhaps a bit magical, but the images from this cave were absolutely awe-inspiring. They inspired me to create a crystal cave collection. The collection began as a concept for 2D pieces created with carefully crafted code that I wrote and tweaked over months, to achieve just the right variation and glow, and continues with these vibrant 3D sculptures. I'm excited to share this sparkling geode as part of my first ever 3D collection and hope it brings magic to your metaverse abode or digital showcase.
